DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The study aim establish high risk admission model readmission model elderly Taiwan . Method : Investigators compare clinical , epidemiological , socioeconomic characteristic admit patient 1 August,2011 31 July,2012 . All patient follow end study identify 14 day readmission 30 day readmission geriatic ward . Expected Outcomes : ( 1 ) To compare prediction value derivation cohort validation cohort . ( 2 ) To identify high risk indicator admission readmission elderly . ( 3 ) To determine risk factor admission elderly association quality indicator .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age 65 year old 2 . Patients admission geriatric ward 1 . Patients unstable vital sign 2 . Patients dependant reject sign inform consent .
